## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

Describe the problem this feature would solve. Example: "I'm always frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Alternative Solutions

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Case

Describe the use case for this feature. Who would benefit from it? How would it be used?

## Feature Category

Check the category that best fits your feature request:

- [ ] New particle shape/formation
- [ ] New gesture control
- [ ] Visual effect/rendering improvement
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] UI/UX enhancement
- [ ] Accessibility feature
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Developer experience
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Priority

How important is this feature to you?

- [ ] Critical - Blocks usage
- [ ] High - Significantly improves experience
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Minor enhancement

## Complexity Estimate

If you're familiar with the codebase, estimate implementation complexity:

- [ ] Low - Simple change, clear implementation
- [ ] Medium - Moderate effort, some complexity
- [ ] High - Significant effort, complex implementation
- [ ] Unknown - Need investigation
